title: Use numpy arrays for quality stats
Use config files for VCF and summary.txt fields
Use arrays and implement heuristic to make consensus deduplication more efficient
Support read names in any format for primer BQ masking
Support phased SNPs/MNPs and InDels in multi branch
Remove ID, QUAL, FILTER fields in summary.txt or use them
Support CL arguments in any order
Accessory R scripts in Prototype folder
body:
Hi,

Are there step-by-step instructions for running the R scripts found in the prototype folder? I can get the script to run without an error, but it doesn't return any output. There's a chance I'm passing the wrong input files -
What input flags does this script require? 
If this script is meant to be run after run_satmut_to_dimsum.py , why does the R script require summary.txt files? (As opposed to DiMSum_counts.txt) 

Thanks for your help!
